title: Num Ri
text:
Num Ri is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> in the <a href="Khumbu">Khumbu</a> region of the <a href="Nepal">Nepal</a>ese <a href="Himalayas">Himalayas</a>. Num Ri consists of a long ridge that culminates eastwards in a pyramid summit. Neighbouring mountains are <a href="Imja%20Tse">Island Peak</a>, <a href="Baruntse">Baruntse</a> and <a href="Cho%20Polu">Cho Polu</a>.
Num Ri was first climbed on November 7, 2002 by the German climbers Olaf Rieck, Lydia Schubert and Carsten Schmidt.
